## My meme

"My meme" is one of those final scenes from the movie Casablanca. 
The meme itself and the culture of meme are very new to me. 
I have not get used to or familiar with it. Therefor I have chosen the meme from one of my favorite movies to start with. 

![meme](my_meme.png)

```{r file='meme.R', eval=FALSE}
library(magick)

final_scene <- image_read("https://cdn.quotesgram.com/img/4/23/86248399-2389aed455b9ba548413e19817666d26.jpg") %>%
  image_scale(500)

movie_text <- image_blank (width = 500,
                           height = 750,
                           color = "#000000") %>%
  image_annotate(text = "Final Scene\nCasablanca",
                 color = "#FFFFFF",
                 size = 80,
                 font = "Eras Bold ITC",
                 gravity = "center")

meme <- c(final_scene, movie_text)
  image_append(meme)
```

## My animated GIF

The meme called "a rocky planet" just caught my attention at the first glance and along with other three memes. I think this may be a kind of humor rather than too serious as "My meme" above.   

![animation](my_animation.gif)

```{r file='animation.R', eval=FALSE}
library(magick)

frame1<-image_read("https://i.imgflip.com/2373dw.jpg") %>%
  image_scale(500)
frame2<-image_read("https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.DAQNhsndM2ag-Jt5uUmiFgAAAA?pid=ImgDet&rs=1") %>%
  image_scale(500)
frame3<-image_read("https://th.bing.com/th/id/R.42f0bd67e439ee6106f585038c6b34bc?rik=gJMtZPa%2fh88Zjw&riu=http%3a%2f%2fimg.memecdn.com%2frocket-science_o_2018329.jpg&ehk=8bxlMUmEUKyHq9IMAGRS%2b60x0Ofnu2%2fzeTLpt9xptsE%3d&risl=&pid=ImgRaw&r=0") %>%
  image_scale(500)
frame4<-image_read("https://i.pinimg.com/originals/f2/92/bc/f292bce8c0f67ef031beb05802b1fa04.jpg") %>%
  image_scale(500)

animation<-c(frame1,frame2,frame3,frame4)

animation %>%
  image_animate(fps=1)

```
